attributes.action: Create a single public sector pay scale for all public sector workers, including elected officials
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We note that there are currently many different pay scales for different parts of the public sector resulting in some workers being restricted to below inflation cost of living rises whilst others enjoy well over inflation rises.  We call upon the Prime Minister to create and implement a single comprehensive pay scale for all public sector workers, in all areas of the public sector, to include both employed workers and elected officials such as councilors, MPs and ministers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
